data.text: @EU_Commission We're still EU citizens!
@EU_Commission @BCCletts @MichelBarnier As a Brit, thanks for this - your honesty and transparency shames the @theresa_may government.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Please stop! I was quite happy being an EU citizen all along. Tweet in French please, I need the practice! (I find German more difficult)
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Hopefully include Scotland
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Reminder: The UK Government doesn't speak for Scotland
@EU_Commission @UKIPNFKN @MichelBarnier Theresa May-be will never be ready. And she may not even be Prime Minister much longer... with any luck.
@EU_Commission UK citizens are EU citizens too. And many of us want to Remain EU citizens.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Good to hear Mr Barnier common purpose to look after both sets of people. Start the negotiations on a good footing
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Scotland wants to stay. Fit us in somewhere please.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Please help Scotland in anyway you can, we are Scottish Europeans! Good luck! x
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Please make a second referendum an obligation. Thanks, the 48%
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier :'(
@EU_Commission Thank you. Seems that you care more about us than our own politicians.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Drop the £100bn and make trade deal outline part of the first phase, or no deal. Simple
@EU_Commission @KirstyS_Hughes Compare and contrast with Busted Britain

@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier May I ask you to take into account the #Scotland overwhelmingly vote to stay.
And, to represent our interests, despite #Brexit negotiators.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Stop laughing, stop it, we seem to be having a few problems with people believing the crap some people say. Find Farage, make UKIP pay up
@EU_Commission @VDombrovskis @pierremoscovici @mariannethyssen @ecfin Under ssp only GR in the EEU area.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Go on Michel we support you. ...
@EU_Commission lost count of how many sleepless nights I have had, if only the UK government had a plan, massive uncertainty 4 farmers in UK
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Many Millions of us didn't want this. Press & UKIP lied to millions more to get them to vote. People with vested interests=Hostile Takeover.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Remember,  May & co just want to crash out with no deal & blame the EU. Please don't let them get away with that. #stopbrexit
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier In French ?
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier I'm very sorry about this, embarrassed by many of my compatriots and worse by my clowns in government.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Any chance you could lose it for us?
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Thank you, the EU has represented me more as a U.K. Citizen since #brexit than my own gov. I won't forget it.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier So where's our cheque for our share of the assets?
@EU_Commission Thank you again for your decency, honesty & transparency. All attributes of decent people which are obviously sadly absent in UK Government.
@EU_Commission @GerardAraud I am very, very sorry my country has chosen this act of selfish folly. Good luck with the Perfidious Albion.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier From who the mandate?
@EU_Commission Glad someone is interested in protecting Citizens rights. Much appreciated.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Could you just hang on a bit? We are currently in the process of shafting the electorate. #Brexit
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Looking forward to reading about what our UK government is up to. Thanks EU 👍
@EU_Commission Thuis birds are flying hy in the sky.
@EU_Commission @jdportes How grown ups behave in negotiations
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Thank you for your honesty, decency & transparency. I'm really sorry people I have to call "My Government" don't have those attributes.

@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier ugly EU!
That isnt the EU i dreamt of. Hope-killer!
UK cousins leave by yr fault
FR will in 5 yrs
Hurry: show a better face than Sta Market
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Aspetta e spera
@EU_Commission UK citizens in Spain are known to infringe on host country's citizens.
@EU_Commission What about UK citizens in the UK? A lot of us don't want to leave...
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Its a long road but rest assured decent British folk will be working to rejoin. We just have to be rid of the right wing retards!
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Sorry everyone! Looks like we are going back to being the sick man of Europe again!
@EU_Commission @EuEthnic @JunckerEU @MichelBarnier don't print those table cards yet, @theresa_may has a #dementiatax issue and may not be turning up...
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Dialogue, pas monologue!
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier you do realise that no legal decision has been taken by the U.K. and therefore you are in breach of A50?
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Well let's hope talks are carried out in a cool and level headed fashion, with pragmatism ruling! Any hint of punishment and Britain walks!
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier You might be waiting a while, we have a bunch of imbeciles running the place
@EU_Commission In the event that negotiation breakdown reroutes Irish haulage around the UK, will the EU provide assistance?
@EU_Commission Thankfully somebody is concerned about us
@EU_Commission @AlexTaylorNews @MichelBarnier Not yet, Election before ;D
@EU_Commission @OpenB_Lewes The people didn't decide to leave. A small minded minority of the full population decided to leave and lots of us are still really angry.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Michael, I'm ready to start the negotiations with you this coming Monday on behalf of the UK. Where shall I meet you?
@EU_Commission Why don't you take the initiative and announce UK citizens will retain existing rights. ???? #brexit #EU #Euro #GE17
@EU_Commission  @MichelBarnier always remember that us here in Northern Ireland and our Scottish (many English) friends have voted to remain
@EU_Commission Finally they are leaving the sinking sh...sorry sinking wreck..
@EU_Commission Also, 'open and transparent'. Subtweeting Ms May, there?
@EU_Commission plz don't let us leave, we're sorry 🇪🇺
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier It could be a while
@EU_Commission Yes please to all of those principles!  👍
@EU_Commission Ashamed to be British.
@EU_Commission @GerardAraud @MichelBarnier Hope you present the Brexiters with a few home truths for following Farage's folly.
@EU_Commission I LL get back on this Societe générale knows about as i worked with cnbc and alone on derivqtives
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Large % of UK doesn't want to leave the EU, #Brexit was pushed through using media & lies & misinformation. Should be more UK debate/voting
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Any chance we can just forget the whole thing? We would all be so much better off. @Conservatives @theresa_may @DExEUgov
@EU_Commission Bumbling and failing bureaucracy
@EU_Commission @TNavracsicsEU @EUErasmusPlus @NatBruxelles Well start by getting jobs for the 50% youth unemployed in Southern Europe! The EU and Euro created this, fix it!
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier do you think if they don't turn up we can just pretend the whole sorry mess never happened?
@EU_Commission This is a scam! The EU is a Ponzi scheme. It has no money. It uses others people's money to gain influence, suck you in and take your money!
@EU_Commission @ecfin Suggest you check out the 50% youth unemployment in Southern Europe! A EU creation.
@EU_Commission @VDombrovskis @pierremoscovici @mariannethyssen @ecfin You can't explain pure stupidity. Let people get on with their lives. You are redundant!
@EU_Commission @VeraJourova @EU_Justice Europeans do not need all this nonsense, dictated by nobodies in Brussels. Go and count your expenses or something. Get out of the way!
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier It is not up to the EU to say what phase 1 is. There might be only one phase. We are leaving, goodbye!
@EU_Commission Look you silly jumped up EU. The UK is in the driving seat, the UK will set the terms. Watch and learn!
@EU_Commission @_AfricanUnion Stop the horror in the mediterranean. Far too many deaths at sea and yet more people are trying. Save lives.
@EU_Commission @UEmadrid Can't wait to hear May moan and whine about how cruel the UE is demanding that leaving it actually means leaving it.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier A Continental William the Conqueror & Pope can surpass & punish those Saxon heretics, if they break promises.
@EU_Commission The Anglo-Brits, due to timidity need middlemen to talk, mostly. But not Scot-Brits or Celts. That's what I saw...
@EU_Commission @EmmanuelMacron French soldiers are genocidaires, pedophiles, sexual delinquents. You must stop supporting France
@EU_Commission @EmmanuelMacron 41 minors, mostly boys, some of whom were only 7 years old, were victims of rape and sexual assault
@EU_Commission are u going to respond to blackmail done by EPA opposition #ouganda&tanzania hidden  behind burundi sanctions.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier We demand Rich Tea biscuits are the only biscuits allowed on the negotiating table. Otherwise you're sitting at the table by yourself
@EU_Commission @EmmanuelMacron Operation Barkhane or arms dealers, support for terrorists, innocent children rapists, genocide ...
@EU_Commission @EmmanuelMacron Francois Hollande wanted to divide the north Malian and the South by selling American weapons
@EU_Commission @EmmanuelMacron The "war against DAECH" in Africa is the greatest imposture of our time. They are all liars
@EU_Commission @EmmanuelMacron FRENCH soldiers come to impose peace in CAR on behalf of the UN rape 7-year-olds : THE DISHONOR.
@EU_Commission @EmmanuelMacron France, with 7 genocides, is the largest criminal organization ever created on this planet
@EU_Commission @EmmanuelMacron We must not help France in its African genocides and its dirty wars which never end in Africa
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier I am not an EU citizen I never voted to be an EU citizen I never signed a document agreeing to be an EU citizen
@EU_Commission Adolf Merkle given the go ahead, the corrupt EU.
@EU_Commission the corrupt EU, Adolf Merkles puppies.
@EU_Commission @EULondonMark EU negotiating team, approach & strategy in place, approved & ready to go. Whereas UK has David Davis and a Daily Express Editorial
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier oh... but she wanted strong stable and secret!
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Well......looks like we may be getting a 'running commentary' after all. 👍
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier We do hope that Michael will be tweeting more in English now as English is THE language spoken by most #citizens of the EU. @PulseofEurope
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier The architects of the Marshall Plan said over and over that Europe could not thrive without a unified economy.
@EU_Commission Thats what you want to talk about. May not be tge same for.  #justsayNOEU
@EU_Commission @lsebrexitvote @MichelBarnier How long before the Smug git tells the UK that anything reported is fake news.
@EU_Commission @MichelBarnier Interessant te zien hoe open EU commissie wil zijn rond Brexit en hoe gesloten ze was rond TTIP.
